dmca.title: Notice of Copyright Infringement/DMCA Take Down Demand per 17 USC 512 (c)
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Justin S. [mailto:webmaster@proxify.com] 
Posted At: Monday, September 11, 2006 2:32 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Notice of Copyright Infringement/DMCA Take Down Demand per
17 USC 512 (c) 
Subject: Notice of Copyright Infringement/DMCA Take Down Demand per 17
USC 512 (c) 


The infringing material continues to be accessible in the location that
we identified in our previous letter (included below).

The Digital Millennium Copyright Act provides that an Online Service
Provider ("OSP") of an Information Location Tool shall enjoy safe harbor
from liability for copyright infringement if the service provider, "upon
notification of claimed infringement as described in subsection
(c)(iii), responds expeditiously to remove, or disable access to, the
material that is claimed to be infringing or to be the subject of
infringing activity, except that, for purposes of this paragraph, the
information described in (c)(3)(A)(iii) shall be identification of the
reference or link, to material or activity claimed to be infringing,
that is to be removed or access to which is to be disabled, and
information reasonably sufficient to pennit the service provider to
locate that reference or link." 17 U.S.C. 512(d)(3).

Our previous letter constituted notification of claimed infringement.  
Accordingly, UpsideOut, Inc. D.B.A. Proxify demands that you act
expeditiously to remove, or disable access to, the web page listed above
in order for you to claim a safe harbor under the DMCA from liability
for contributory and vicarious copyright infringement.  
Please immediately delete or disable access to this web page and remove
its contents from view. Thank you.

Signed,
Justin Schlecter, 2006-09-11
Proxify.com Administrator
1-877-PROXIFY




On Sep 4, 2006, at 12:22 PM, Justin S. wrote:
> To Whom It May Concern,
>
> I am writing to file a notice of copyright infringement in  
> accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.
>
> 1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on  
> "http://proxify.com/". Proxify.com is a wholly owned subsidiary of  
> UpsideOut, Inc. and has been in operation since 2003-04-14.
>
> 2. The material that we believe is infringing the copyrighted work  
> listed in item #1 appears on "http:// 
> saeedlinkestoon.persianblog.com/" which is located at IP address  
> "70.85.27.87". This is the second time that we have had to send a  
> notice of copyright infringement for websites hosted at this IP  
> address. Specifically, the material is, "Proxify is a web-based  
> anonymous proxy service which allows anyone to surf the Web  
> privately and securely. Unlike other proxies, there is no software  
> to install or complicated instructions to follow. Just enter a URL  
> (website address) in the form above. Through Proxify, you can use  
> websites but they cannot uniquely identify or track you. Proxify  
> hides your IP address and our encrypted connection prevents  
> monitoring of your network traffic. Once using Proxify, you can  
> surf normally and forget that it is there, protecting you."
>
>
> 3. My contact information:
> Name: Justin Schlecter
> Company: UpsideOut, Inc. D.B.A. Proxify
> Address: 1333A N. Ave., STE 315, New Rochelle, NY 10804
> Phone: 1-877-PROXIFY
> Email: webmaster@proxify.com
>
>
> 4. Contact information for the owner of the allegedly infringing  
> material:
>    AriaGostar co.
>    Mehdi Boutorabi (reza.hashemi@gmail.com)
>    +61.299133088
>    Fax:
>    Suite8a
>    5VukoPlace
>    Warriewood, NSW 1622
>    AU
>
>
> 5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials  
> described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the  
> copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
>
> 6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the  
> notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am  
> authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that  
> is allegedly infringed.
>
> Signed,
> Justin Schlecter, 2006-09-04
> Proxify.com Administrator
> 1-877-PROXIFY
>
>
>
>
